title: Al Wadi Al Akhdars New Star Product All Natural Pomegranate Molasses
text:
(MENAFN Press) BEIRUT, June 18, 2015 /PRNewswire/ --

Al Wadi Al Akhdar recently released their all-natural version of pomegranate molasses, a 100% natural addition to your pantry that will take your cooking to the next level.

(Photo: http://photos.prnewswire.com/prnh/20150618/224034 )

Al Wadi Al Akhdar's latest product is also the most versatile: the 100% All Natural Pomegranate Molasses, known for its persistent presence in Lebanese and Eastern Mediterranean cuisine in addition to its many health benefits.

The All Natural Pomegranate Molasses from Al Wadi Al Akhdar is made from pure concentrated pomegranate juice and is today still unique to the market as opposed to the regular pomegranate molasses, which contains additives like sugar and citric acid.

Pomegranate Molasses is found in many dishes of the Eastern Mediterranean cuisine like marinades, glazes, dressings, salads, mezze, savory dishes, and even desserts.

Launched in 2014, the 100% All Natural Pomegranate Molasses has since become available on sale on Amazon.

As stated by Cynthia Bu Jawdeh, the social media specialist at Al Wadi Al Akhdar: "There's always a favorite in every family! Among our wide range of products, Pomegranate Molasses is no doubt one of our favorites; it is extremely versatile and it adds a unique exceptional taste to your recipes."

Visit a store near you or order the All Natural Pomegranate Molasses online to add a Middle Eastern touch to your cuisine.

Try out our 100% All Natural Pomegranate Molasses in this traditional Eastern Mediterranean dish.

Muhammara:

Serves 4 - Preparation time 10 min

Ingredients

1 cup walnuts, toasted and chopped
3 red bell peppers, roasted and peeled
2-3 garlic cloves, minced
cup breadcrumbs, toasted
tsp cumin
1 tsp paprika
tsp tabasco
tsp salt
1 tbsp lemon juice
2 tbsp Al Wadi Al Akhdar Pomegranate Molasses
4 tbsp Al Wadi Al Akhdar extra virgin olive oil
Preparation 

In the bowl of a food processer, pulse the red pepper, the walnut and the garlic until smooth.
Add dry ingredients: breadcrumbs, cumin, paprika, Tabasco, salt and pulse.
With the motor running, add slowly the lemon juice, the pomegranate molasses, and the olive oil and blend until they are completely incorporated.
Decorate with walnuts and a drizzle of olive oil. Serve with bread.
